      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">Axon resting potential measurement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Axon, der mögliches Messen stillsteht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Axone la mesure potentiel au repos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Axon que descansa a medida potencial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Assone che riposa misura potenziale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νευρίτης που στηρίζεται την πιθανή μέτρηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Axon que reclina la medida potencial</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an experimental set-up to demonstrate how to measure the resting potential of an axon using electrodes connected to a voltmeter.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">axons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrodes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plasma membranes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potassium ions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potential differences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pumps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">resting potentials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium ions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">voltmeters</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine experimentelle 
Installation, um zu zeigen, wie man das stillstehende Potential eines 
Axon mit den Elektroden mißt, die an einen Voltmeter angeschlossen 
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que une installation 
expérimentale démontrait comment mesurer le potentiel au repos d'un 
axone à l'aide des électrodes reliées à un voltmètre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma instalação 
experimental para demonstrar como medir o potencial descansando de um 
axon usando os elétrodos conectados a um voltímetro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto 
sperimentale per dimostrare come misurare il potenziale di riposo di 
un assone per mezzo degli elettrodi collegati ad un voltmetro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πειραματική οργάνωση για 
να καταδείξει πώς να μετρήσει τη στηργμένος δυνατότητα ενός 
νευρίτη χρησιμοποιώντας τα ηλεκτρόδια που συνδέονται με ένα 
βολτόμετρο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una disposición 
experimental para demostrar cómo medir el potencial de reclinación 
de un axon usando los electrodos conectados con un voltímetro.</string>
          </description>
